div.head: 哽
div.div: choking [on a foreign object stuck] in the gullet

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: choking [on a foreign object stuck] in the gullet

sense.def: ① Alternative Names geng 鯁 , fishbone stuck in the throat. Pathological Condition identical with geng yan 哽咽 . Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 8: 又療食哽方，鷹糞燒灰存 性， “Another recipe to cure food choking : roast eagle feces to ashes while retaining its nature”.

② Etiological Agent. of choking caused by a foreign object stuck in the throat. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 8 ：禮 云「魚去乙」，謂其頭間有骨如乙字形者，哽入不肯出故也 , “The Li [ ji ] states: ‘From a fish remove the yi .’ That is to say, in its head it has a bone shaped like the character yi . It is the reason of choking , as it enters [the throat] but does not leave it”.
